entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
